page.title: 01Farmland on Brendon Hills
page.content: This block comrises open farmland used for grazing mostly sheep and some cattle. There is a network of minor roads throughout the area. It is very hilly terrain, quite steep in places with scattered farms over the land. There are patches of woodland, small groups of deciduous trees to the west of the block, but larger areas of coniferous trees in the east. The roads are lined with high beech hedges in many places with broad ditches alongside. None of te listed amenities are present in this block, and there is no bus service existing at the present time.
